mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (conversation_id, sender_type, content, created_at) VALUES (#{conversationId}, #{senderType, typeHandler=com.chatbot.common.handler.MessageSenderTypeHandler}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM message WHERE conversation_id = #{conversationId} ORDER BY created_at ASC, id ASC
SELECT * FROM message WHERE conversation_id = #{conversationId} ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC LIMIT 1
